title: kai koDuttALaiyyA
sahitya:
kai koDuttALaiyyA gati yAraiyyA nin kazhalinai
 sharaN aiyyA karuNaiyoDu ittaruNam manam kanindu


anupallavi

  poi kiLar mAya maN vAzhvenum iruLil
pughundu varunda manam iNangAdaDaiyun tiruvuLLam ariyAdA


caraNam    ayan mudhl vAnavarum unadaruLAl aindhozhil puriginrAr marai pugazhum
Adi deivam nIyena nambinEn ini shOdanai pOdum aiyyA puyalil sikkuNDa
vAzhai pOlum shuzhanruLLam tighaikkudaiyyA muppazhamum poriya valarundum meyyanbar sahAyA pugalil En yAnai mukhanE pEdai ennai
